text:
Peter Reilly started removing authors from files. I've got mixed feelings about
this but still, here's a patch that does it completely.
Furthermore there is a list of names that were stripped from the sources
(java/xml/scripts).

As far as detected also individual e-mail addresses / names were also stripped
from individual files
creator: jkf@apache.org
jkf@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 10504
patch removing individual authors from files

Created attachment 10505
list of  authors removed from the sources
creator: jkf@apache.org

text:
The patch has been hand-checked to verify if the javadoc wasn't broken by
removing the @author lines. One file has been translated to unix style line
endings apart from removing the @author lines.
creator: jkf@apache.org
peter.reilly@corvil.com
text:
patched the files and added a CONTRIBUTORS file with
the authors without e-mail addresses
Thanks
